channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Alien’ Comet 3I/ATLAS Gets Closest On Friday — Here’s How To See It
item.description: Comet 3I/ATLAS, a rare interstellar visitor, is visible this week as it departs the solar system, with some public events showing the flyby.

item.title: Give Your Workspace A Colorful Makeover With The New Lofree Lipstick Keyboard

item.title: Republicans Can Solve The Healthcare Crisis—And Win Politically
item.description: A number of Republicans are currently comatose when it comes to pushing positive healthcare policies. Here’s how they can overcome this.

item.title: Semantic Leakage Is Taking A Hefty Toll On AI Producing Harmonious Mental Health Advice
item.description: Semantic leakage occurs when a word in a prompt is later used in an LLM chat in an unsuspecting way. This can be worrisome in AI mental health chats. ...

item.title: Google Issues Free Gmail Upgrade Offer—Now It’s Decision Time
item.description: This AI upgrade is exciting and new — but there are risks. You need to decide carefully.

item.title: The thing about chess
item.description: In a typical tournament, you don’t score any extra points for winning with the fewest number of moves. Quickly isn’t the point.

item.title: Filtering ourselves
item.description: We don’t use the same language or ideas with an in-law that we do with our bar buddies. When the internet was young, people often chose to filter them...

item.title: Better than the cheap alternative

item.title: Taken for granted

item.title: Where did kiwi come from?
